hw_api_content->mimetype

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi SVN)

hw_api_content->mimetype — Returns mimetype

Description

string hw_api_content::mimetype ( void )

Returns the mimetype of the content.

Return Values

Returns the mimetype as a string.
